parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Must always be set to table-rule-sets.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
The name of the rule set. This may be used to describe the type of game
      being offered at a table.

parameters.name: deck-count
parameters.description: The number of decks that will be used at the table.

parameters.name: player-position-count
parameters.description: The number of playing positions at the table. Must be between 5 and 7.

parameters.name: maximum-players-per-position
parameters.description: The maximum number of players that can play from an individual position on the table.

parameters.name: maximum-bets-per-player
parameters.description:
The maximum number of bets that a player can make at a table. This is
      naturally limited by the number of positions, but could be lower.

parameters.name: no-hole-card
parameters.description: If true, the dealer does not deal themselves a hole card during the initial deal. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: original-bets-only
parameters.description: This boolean can only be set to true or false if no-hole-card is true. When original-bets-only is true, if the player's hand loses to dealer blackjack, only the mandatory initial bet is forfeited, and all optional bets (doubles and splits) are pushed.

parameters.name: initial-player-card-face-up
parameters.description: This boolean indicates whether the initial card dealt to players is face up. It defaults to true.

parameters.name: blackjack-pay-out
parameters.description: The amount that a winning blackjack hand pays out as a multiple of the original bet.

parameters.name: standard-pay-out
parameters.description: The amount that a standard winning hand pays out as a multiple of the original bet.

parameters.name: dealer-stands-at
parameters.description: The total at which the dealer must stand. Defaults to 17.

parameters.name: dealer-draws-if-soft-stand-at
parameters.description: A boolean that if true requires the dealer to hit on the dealer-stands-at total if the total is soft.

parameters.name: surrender
parameters.description: An enum that indicates whether surrender is offered and if so, how. Valid values include not_allowed, early, and late. Defaults to not_allowed".

parameters.name: surrender-percentage
parameters.description: A decimal that indicates the percentage of the original bet that is surrendered when the player makes that choice. Must be NULL if surrender is not_allowed

parameters.name: insurance-available
parameters.description: A boolean that indicates whether insurance side bets are offered. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: insurance-pay-out
parameters.description: A decimal that is the multiple of the original bet that is paid if an insurance side bet is won. Must be NULL if insurance-available is false.

parameters.name: dealer-match-available
parameters.description: A boolean that indicates whether dealer match side bets are offered. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: dealer-match-pay-out
parameters.description: A decimal that is the multiple of the original bet that is paid if a dealer match side bet is won. Must be NULL if dealer-match-available is false.

parameters.name: double-down-minimum-percentage
parameters.description: A decimal that is the multiple of the original bet that is the minimum bet in "double down" situations. Defaults to 1.0.

parameters.name: double-down-maximum-percentage
parameters.description: A decimal that is the multiple of the original bet that is the maximum bet in "double down" situations. Defaults to 1.0.

parameters.name: split-identical-ranks-only
parameters.description: A boolean that indicates if a player can only split identical ranks (for example, 2 Jacks) or if they can split as long as the value of the rank is the same. Defaults to false

parameters.name: maximum-double-count-per-hand
parameters.description:
An integer that indicates the maximum number of times that a player can double down per original hand.
      Defaults to NULL (no maximum).

parameters.name: maximum-split-count-per-hand
parameters.description:
An integer that indicates the maximum number of times that a player can split per original hand.
      Defaults to NULL (no maximum).

parameters.name: may-hit-split-aces
parameters.description: A boolean that indicates if the player may hit, split, or double split aces. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: non-controlling-player-chooses-split-hand-to-bet-if-not-following
parameters.description: A boolean that indicates whether a player that does not choose to follow a split by the controlling player is allowed to choose which of the split hands to bet. Defaults to false by default.

parameters.name: player-must-stand-on-soft-21
parameters.description: A boolean that indicates if a player must stand on a soft 21. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: restrict-doubling-to-hard-totals
parameters.description: An array that includes the totals that can be doubled. Defaults to NULL (which means there are no restrictions).

parameters.name: dealer-wins-ties
parameters.description: A boolean that indicates if a dealer wins tied hands. Otherwise the hands push (nobody wins). Defaults to false.

parameters.name: round-initial-betting-window-seconds
parameters.description:
An integer that indicates the number of seconds that the initial betting window will
      last for each round at the table.

parameters.name: minimum-wager-amount
parameters.description: An integer that indicates the minimum initial wager amount.
